element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT tis.name store, rd.name dsname, CONCAT_WS(' ',tic.id, tic.name) classif, ri.item, ri.name, ri.price, SUM(ri.quantity * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) qtt, SUM(ri.total * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) tot_nodsc, SUM(ri.discount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) dsc FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX(date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_store tis ON tip.store_id=tis.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item ri ON ri.cash_id = r.cash_id AND ri.receipt_header = r.id AND ri.discount!=0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_classif tic ON tic.id=ri.classif AND tic.nomenclature_id=1 INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item_discount rid ON rid.cash_id = r.cash_id AND rid.receipt_item = ri.id AND rid.receipt_discount!=0 INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_discounts rd ON rd.cash_id = r.cash_id AND rd.receipt_header = r.id AND rd.id = rid.receipt_discount AND rd.discount_type IN (65,94,97,106,107,108) WHERE f.result = 0 AND f.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE( :pFrom , '%Y-%m-%d') AND f.`date` < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pTo , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY tis.name , rd.name, CONCAT_WS(' ',tic.id, tic.name), ri.item, ri.name ORDER BY tis.name , rd.name, CONCAT_WS(' ',tic.id, tic.name), ri.item, ri.name
